Package
Description
org.dellroad.hl7
This is the API documentation for the hl7lib Java library.
org.dellroad.hl7.io
Classes relating to sending and receiving HL7 messages.
org.dellroad.hl7.llp
Classes relating to HL7 "lower layer protocol" (LLP) framing.
